title: Ukraine Shifts to War Footing, Tells Citizens to Leave Russia
sub_head: Kyiv declares state of emergency and begins call-up of reservists
body:
KYIV, Ukraine—Ukraine declared a state of emergency and began to mobilize reservists on Wednesday, calling on its citizens to leave Russia immediately because of a growing threat of war.
In Moscow, President Vladimir Putin said Russia is ready for dialogue, but praised the readiness of Russia’s armed forces, which he said have been modernized and sharpened by exercises.
